spec_data.Name: gpm-devel
spec_data.License: GPLv2 and GPLv2+ with exceptions and GPLv3+ and Verbatim and Copyright only
spec_data.Description:
The gpm-devel package includes header files and libraries necessary
for developing programs which use the gpm library. The gpm provides
mouse support to text-based Linux applications.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 22 Feb 2017 11:06:06 PM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Development files for the gpm library
